fullText: Magic/Bird: A Courtship of Rivals is a fascinating chronicle of two basketball legends who started out as bitter enemies and ended up as devoted friends.
dtliExcerpt: Magic/Bird: A Courtship of Rivals is a fascinating chronicle of two basketball legends who started out as bitter enemies and ended up as devoted friends.
